name: The Fall Of Pizza Cat
description:
Hey this isn't a serious Rpg Maker game its mostly a test and I've uploaded it to here because some of my friends are interested in playing it. You can play it too of course!
It's probably not a good game but if you do take your time to play it I'll greatly appreciate it!

I was going to add NG+ and fully expand on the story but I have stopped that to work on other projects.
